synopsis.text: Capcom's world-renowned action RPG, Dragon's Dogma, is reborn as a thrilling Netflix original anime series. The narrative unfolds around Ethan, an ordinary man turned vengeful hero, as he embarks on a perilous quest to slay the dragon that stole his heart and destroyed his peaceful life. Resurrected as an 'Arisen,' Ethan is caught in a treacherous world where his humanity wanes with every demon he confronts. These formidable foes embody the seven deadly sins of mankind, presenting Ethan with harrowing challenges that test his resolve. Alongside a mysterious woman named Hannah, Ethan navigates the vast open world of Cassardis, driven by vengeance and the tantalizing promise of reclaiming his heart from the clutches of the malevolent dragon. Join Ethan on this action-packed adventure, where every battle risks not only his life but also his very soul.
